Inside #Project2025’s Secret Training Videos

“Eradicate #ClimateChange references”; only talk to #conservative #media; don’t leave a paper trail for watchdogs to discover [#criminal activity]. In a series of never-before-published videos, Project 2025 details how a second #Trump admin would operate.

#Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #democracy #HarrisWalz2024

card.title: Inside Project 2025’s Secret Training Videos
card.description: “Eradicate climate change references”; only talk to conservative media; don’t leave a paper trail for watchdogs to discover. In a series of never-before-published videos, Project 2025 details how a second Trump administration would operate.

ancestors.content:
#Project2025, the controversial playbook & #policy agenda for a #RightWing presidential admin, has lost its director & faced scathing criticism from both Democratic groups & Trump. But Project 2025’s plan to train an #army of #PoliticalAppointees who could battle against the so-called [mythical] deep state govt bureaucracy on behalf of a future #Trump admin remains on track.

#Trump #Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #democracy #HarrisWalz2024

ancestors.content:
One centerpiece of that program is dozens of never-before-published videos created for #Project2025’s #PresidentialAdministrationAcademy. The vast majority of these videos — 23 in all, totaling >14 hrs of content — were provided to #ProPublica & #Documented by a person who had access to them.

#Trump #Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #democracy #HarrisWalz2024

ancestors.content:
The #Project2025 videos coach future appointees on everything from the nuts & bolts of governing to how to outwit bureaucrats. There are strategies for avoiding embarrassing #FOIA disclosures & ensuring that #conservative #policies aren’t struck down by “left-wing judges.” Some of the content is routine…. Other segments of the training offer guidance on radically changing how the #federal govt works & what it does.

#Trump #Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight

ancestors.content:
In one video, Bethany Kozma, a #conservative activist & fmr deputy chief of staff at the US Agency for International Development [#USAID] in the #Trump admin, downplays the seriousness of #ClimateChange & says the movement to combat it is really part of a ploy to “control people.”

“If the American people elect a conservative president, his administration will have to eradicate climate change references from absolutely everywhere,” Kozma says.

#Trump #Vance #HeritageFoundation #FarRight

ancestors.content:
In the video, Kozma calls the idea of #gender fluidity “evil.” Another speaker, Katie Sullivan, who was an acting asst AG at the #DOJ under #Trump, takes aim at executive actions by the admin of President #Biden that created gender adviser positions throughout the #federal govt. The goal, Biden wrote in one order, was to “advance #EqualRights & opportunities, regardless of gender or gender #identity.”

#Trump #Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #HarrisWalz2024

ancestors.content:
Sullivan says, “That position [#EqualRights for the #gender fluid] has to be eradicated, as well as all the task forces, the removal of all the #equity plans from all the websites, & a complete rework of the language in internal & external policy documents & grant applications.”

#Trump #Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #democracy #HarrisWalz2024

ancestors.content:
#Trump has tried to distance himself from #Project2025, falsely saying [lying] that he knew nothing about it & had “no idea who is behind it.”

…A review of the training videos shows that 29 of the 36 speakers have worked for Trump in some capacity — on his 2016-17 transition team, in the admin or on his 2024 reelection campaign.

#Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #democracy #HarrisWalz2024

She then tells viewers that she sees #ClimateChange as merely a cover to engage in population control. “I think about the people who don’t want you to have children because of the” — here she makes air-quotes — “impact on the environment.” She adds, “This is part of their ultimate goal to control people.”

#Trump #Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #democracy #HarrisWalz2024

descendants.content:
Later, Katie Sullivan, the fmr acting asst AG under #Trump, advocates for removing so-called #CRT from public #education w/o saying how the federal govt would accomplish that. (Elementary & secondary education curricula are typically set at the state & local level, not by the federal govt.)

“The noxious tenets of #CriticalRaceTheory & #gender ideology should be excised from curriculum in every single public school in this country,” Sullivan says.

#Project2025
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Seq93F5agpc

card.title: “The Removal of All the Equity Plans”
card.html: <iframe width="200" height="113" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Seq93F5agpc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-forms"></iframe>

descendants.content:
In a different video, David Burton, an #economic #policy expert at the #HeritageFoundation, discusses the importance of an obscure yet influential agency called the Office of Information & Regulatory Affairs. The #Trump admin used #OIRA to help roll back #regulations on economic, fiscal & #environmental issues.

#Project2025 #Vance #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #democracy #HarrisWalz2024

descendants.content:
Under #Biden, OIRA took a more aggressive stance in helping review & shape new #regulations, which included efforts to combat #housing #discrimination, ban the sale of #GhostGuns & set new #renewable fuel targets.
Burton, in the #Project2025 video, urges future #PoliticalAppointees to work in #OIRA & argues that the office should “increase its staffing levels considerably”…[to]…rein in the so-called administrative state—the fed agencies that craft & issue new regulations.

#Trump #radicalization

“50 people are not enough to adequately police the regulatory actions of the entire federal government,” Burton says. “#OIRA is one of the few government agencies that limits the regulatory ambitions of other agencies.” (Burton confirmed in a brief interview that he appeared in the video & endorsed expanding OIRA’s staffing levels.)

#Trump #Vance #HeritageFoundation #Project2025 #extremism #radicalization #FarRight
#law #democracy #HarrisWalz2024

#Project2025 #Vance #HeritageFoundation #extremism #radicalization #FarRight

“The American people who vote for a *conservative* presidential admin, they’re not reading The NYT, they’re not reading The Washington Post. …in a video about #oversight & #investigations, a group of *conservative* investigators advise future appointees on how to avoid creating a paper trail of sensitive comms that could be obtained by congress or outside grps under #FOIA
“…it’s probably better to walk down the hall, buttonhole a guy & say, ‘Hey, what are we going to do here?’ Talk through the decision,” says Tom Jones, a fmr Senate investigator who now runs the [zero irony] American #Accountability Foundation

Jones adds that it’s possible that agency lawyers could cite exemptions in the public-records #law to prevent the release of certain documents. But appointees are best served, he argues, if they don’t put important communications in writing in the first place.
